ingredients: 1   +   1/2 cups crushed ice, 1  banana, chopped, 1  kiwi, peeled and chopped,   +   1/2 cup chopped strawberries,   +   1/2 cup chopped pineapple,   +   1/4 cup cream of coconut, 1 tablespoon coconut flakes for garnish
nutrition: Total Fat 2g 3%, Saturated Fat 1g 7%, Sodium 18mg 1%, Total Carbohydrate 57g 21%, Dietary Fiber 8g 30%, Total Sugars 35g, Protein 3g, Vitamin C 164mg 819%, Calcium 55mg 4%, Iron 1mg 7%, Potassium 878mg 19%
